q1.question: Will Sprite Strikers use AI-generated art?
q1.answer: No. The final release of Sprite Strikers will not contain any AI-generated content. The current assets are strictly placeholders used to convey the visual direction we aim to achieve with human artists.

q2.question: When will Sprite Strikers be released?
q2.answer: The game will be released regardless, but the final quality, scope, and development speed will heavily depend on the success of our crowdfunding campaign.

q3.question: Can I support the game outside of Kickstarter?
q3.answer: Yes! You can buy us a coffee (direct donation) through our Ko-fi page here: Our Ko-fi Page.

q4.question: Can I contribute in non-monetary ways?
q4.answer: Absolutely! You can help us immensely by sharing the project with your friends, applying to be a Beta Tester, or simply sending us your feedback and reviews through our Guild forms.

q5.question: I am an artist or musician and want to offer my services, how can I do that?
q5.answer: You can use the 'Tavern Whispers' form just above, or send a raven directly to our email: sprite.strikers@gmail.com.

main.title: Welcome to Caelestis
main.p1: A world where harmony and color define the horizon. Here, civilization has not only advanced technologically but flourished through a mystical bond with the Echoes: astonishing creatures of pure energy capable of manifesting magic itself.
main.p2: But peace is a fragile crystal. Thirsty for limitless power, factions of the Aethel race betrayed this ancient alliance, creating the Grafted: biotechnological beings born of a chaotic evolution.
main.p3: Today, Caelestis is crumbling. The disappearance of the Echoes has fractured reality, opening dimensional rifts known as "Sprites".
main.caption: Fragment recovered from the Luminal Era

sprites.title: The Sprites
sprites.desc: "Anomalies that disrupt physical laws, pixelating and distorting everything in their path as reality fractures."

grafted.title: The Grafted
grafted.desc: "Biotechnological aberrations born from forbidden experiments with Echoes kidnapped by the Aethel."

strikers.title: The Strikers
strikers.desc: "The new legend: warriors and mercenaries who have stepped forward to save reality."

aethel.name: Aethel
aethel.desc: An ingenious and brave race. Though they bear the stigma of having originated the Grafted, they now lead the battlefront to redeem their legacy.

luminicos.name: Luminals
luminicos.desc: Beings of ancestral grace in perfect communion with nature. They are the first to detect the instability of the Etherials and are the guardians of mystical knowledge.

ferals.name: Ferals
ferals.desc: Warriors half-human, half-animal. They possess heightened instincts and a physical connection to the vital energy of Caelestis, making them relentless trackers.

scintilas.name: Scintilas
scintilas.desc: Small in stature but giants in ingenuity. Masters of blacksmithing and creators of the magical gadgets that allow the races to channel the power of the Echoes.

etherials.name: Etherials (Echoes)
etherials.desc: Pure manifestations of elemental power. They are the origin of magic and the anchors that hold reality together; now, their stability depends on the Strikers.

vesper.name: Vesper Hive
vesper.desc: Travelers from another reality dragged through the rifts. The interference of the 'Sprites' in their mental connection has made them aggressive, turning them into an unpredictable danger.

grafted.name: The Grafted
grafted.desc: The dark mirror of ambition. Biotechnological beings who sacrificed their natural essence to become energy parasites. They are the enemy to defeat.
